title: Demi Lovato Posted a Smokin’ Hot Unedited Butt Selfie and WOW
text:
From Seventeen

The bikini pics just keep coming!

After sharing that she's "tired of being ashamed," of her body, Demi Lovato is putting it all out there for her fans, in a glorious display of self-confidence. She posted a leopard print bikini on Instagram, flaunting her unedited curves and now, she's sharing the back view. Y'all, my jaw is on the floor.

Behold, the butt selfie:

Photo credit: Instagram More

After thanking the designer for her suit on the first Instagram post, she went to her Stories to give a shout out to the Brazilian bottoms â€“ and to share a fair amount of butt cheek.

Not only is she serving us bootay, the picture also doubles as a masterclass in the art of eyebrow crafting. I mean, look at those arches! Flawless.

Follow Kelsey on Instagram!

description: Ok, look back at it, Demi.
